name: coedu
description: Simple app that incorporates git and github into classroms!

scripts.start: parallelshell "npm run dev:jade" "npm run dev:sass" "npm run dev:js" "npm run app"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean; mkdir dist/css dist/js; npm run build:jade; npm run build:sass; npm run build:js;
scripts.build:sass: node-sass -i --output-style compressed src/styles/main.sass | postcss --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/main.css
